en: Now that you have an investor, more possibilities have opened up to you. One of those involves your computer. It was fine at first - you didn't really have a choice - but now you're noticing how much time is lost waiting for applications to open, dealing with crashes, and restarting your computer. Is it worth the money to upgrade it?
You upgrade your computer and spend a day transferring files, programs, and preferences over, making sure you don't lose anything. It'll be worth it in the end.
You decide not to upgrade your computer - this one is running fine, and there are more important things to spend money on.
